entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to build more than one platform target? #28697
  • dotnet tool package cache bug #28695
  • Write installed workload version to workload stamp file. #28682
  • Custom ITask with Output of Reference is not showed in the Projects Dependencies #28694
  • Update roslyn-analyzers version and remove false-positive suppressions #28672
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • `dotnet workload` fails with KeyNotFoundException after updating SDKs #28217
    7.0.1xx
  • restore-toolset.* still referencing 6.0 RC2 #23383

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2026150 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new host #28677
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28666
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider

Updated

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use latest docker containers #28422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
